name: n8n-nodes-base.dataTable
semantic_context: Permanently save data across workflow executions in a table

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: If Row Exists
options.description: Match input items that are in the data table

options.name: If Row Does Not Exist
options.description: Match input items that are not in the data table

options.name: Upsert
options.description: Update row(s), or insert if there is no match

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

matchType.name: matchType
matchType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

filters.name: filters

values.name: keyName
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify using an expression

filters.description: Filter to decide which rows get
filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

options.name: options
dryRun
options.description: Whether the operation simulates and returns affected rows in their "before" and "after" states

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'row' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'row' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataTableId'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'deleteRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'matchType'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'deleteRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF condition IN ["isEmpty", "isNotEmpty", "isTrue", "isFalse"] THEN HIDE parameter 'keyValue'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'deleteRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'insert' THEN SHOW parameter 'columns'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'insert' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'matchType'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'get' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'rowExists' THEN SHOW parameter 'matchType'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'rowExists' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF @version == {'_cnd': {'lt': 0}} THEN SHOW parameter 'condition'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'rowNotExists' THEN SHOW parameter 'matchType'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'rowNotExists' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'matchType'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'columns'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'matchType'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'columns'
IF resource == 'row' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
